Class Agent

  • java.lang.Object
    • Agent
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Lamb, Lion

    public abstract class Agent
extends java.lang.Object
    Agent object class. Defines the moves each piece can make. Lion and Lamb can use all methods defined in this class.

        public abstract boolean specialMove(int pos1,

                  Agent[] board)

      • validate

        public static boolean validate(Agent[] board,
               int pos1,
               int pos2,
               int turn)
        Checks if the requested move is valid move. Checks who's turn it is and if a lamb is placed on the board. Lamb is placed on board when pos2 is over 9000
        Parameters:
        board - the board array
        pos1 - starting position of piece
        pos2 - final position of piece
        turn - tells who's turn it is
        Returns:
        if the move is a valid move or not
